title: Watashi Dake No Kami-Sama - Chikara No Kaifuku No Tame Ni Kiss Wo Nedarareteimasu
alternative_title: 只属于我的神明～为了恢复力量求亲亲～ ; 私だけの神様～力の回復のためにキスをねだられています ; My Very Own God ~ He begs for a kiss to restore his strength
status: 只属于我的神明～为了恢复力量求亲亲～ ; 私だけの神様～力の回復のためにキスをねだられています ; My Very Own God ~ He begs for a kiss to restore his strength
description:
Description :
        Izuki Sudou, who was unreasonably fired from her company, meets an eerily beautiful boy on her way home after being fired. 
Mizuki began to talk with the boy every day in front of the shrine, and she was able to find a new job without incident. In return for his kindness, Mizuki says she wants to be of help to the boy, but... the boy is in fact a monster who failed to become a god?!
"I can eat you, right?”
A caring girl who always gets the short end of the stick and a boy with animal ears who can't become a god. A heart-throbbing love story with a little bit of comedy!
